title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.6 - Inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1100.6 - Inspection and copying

State Regulations
(a) Inspection
and copying of records shall be conducted within the office of the commission
under the supervision of the public access officer or his designee. The person
may make either handwritten copies of records or through the use of his own
copying or reproduction equipment. (b) A charge of 20 cents per page not
exceeding nine inches by 15 inches in size shall be made for each copy
furnished, provided however, that the public access records officer may, in his
discretion, waive all or any portion of such changes for a particular record or
class of records. Notes

1100.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
